p: Data coordinating centers: COHERE Regional Coordinating Centres (RCC), IeDEA data coordination; Bordeaux RCC: Diana Barger, Christine Schwimmer, Monique Termote, Linda Wittkop; Copenhagen RCC: Maria Campbell, Casper M. Frederiksen, Nina Friis-Møller, Jesper Kjaer, Dorthe Raben, Rikke Salbøl Brandt. IeDEA: Don Hoover and Qiuhu Shi.
